channel.title: My first Blog test testing
channel.description: Recent content on My first Blog test testing

item.title: What do I want in my Blog?
item.description:
Hey, my name is Thomas.

At the moment, this blog is in a testing fase. However, I want to use that as an opportunity to learn how to create content with Hugo and Mainroad. Ideally, I have some form of content bar at the top (not sure if thats the correct term) for showing of the main categories of content. This would including Travel stories, About me, Australia WHV, Spanish learning, and more! Of course, I want to include photos, especially with stories and my experience from travelling.
